description:
Join award-winning poet and writer Laurie Bolger for a heartfelt workshop all about celebrating kindness. Through creative prompts and gentle guidance, Laurie will help you craft your own uplifting “messages of kindness” to share. 
The session will close with a special reading of one of Laurie’s poems, reminding us of the power of words to connect, comfort, and inspire.

events.name: Drop in: Bartholomew Fayre: Messages of Kindness

factsheet.heading: Bartholomew Fayre: Messages of Kindess
paragraphs:
Join award-winning poet and writer Laurie Bolger for a heartfelt workshop all about celebrating kindness. Through creative prompts and gentle guidance, Laurie will help you craft your own uplifting “messages of kindness” to share. 
The session will close with a special reading of one of Laurie’s poems, reminding us of the power of words to connect, comfort, and inspire.

location.address: Smithfield Rotunda Garden, West Smithfield, EC1A 9PT

name: Bartholomew Fayre: Messages of Kindness
